title: We are hiring a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with proven experience in running performance campaigns.
job_overview:
We are hiring a Remote Google Ads & Meta Ads Account Manager with proven experience in running performance campaigns.
Send your CV: Upgrade to see actual info

Salary: $3000 - $5000/month depending on experience

Role:

Manage and optimize paid advertising strategies.

Focus on improving CTR, CPA, ROAS.

Work independently in a remote setup.

Requirements:

Minimum 1 year of practical ad management experience.

Analytical skills with data-driven decision-making.
